text: Yommuu Hoolichi chaappaa sadaffaa banettis uumamni jiraataan inni sadaffaan, “Kottu!” jechuu isaa nan dhagaʼe; nan ilaales; kunoo, fardi gurraachi6:5 Fardi gurraachi – kun fakkeenya beelaa jechuunis duʼa beelli fiduu dha. tokko fuula koo dura ture! Inni fardicha yaabbatus madaalii of harkaa qaba ture.
